scenarios.title: CRU Trip due to C-101 Level High-High
learningObjectives: Differentiate drain failure vs upstream slugging
Understand why liquid carryover damages reciprocating compressor valves
Apply safe recovery sequence without rushing reset

decisionPoints.question: What is your FIRST operator action?

options.impact: High risk of liquid carryover and compressor damage; root cause not addressed.

options.text: Confirm C-101 drain status and verify liquid accumulation; check drain seal drum / manual drain readiness
options.impact: Addresses root cause and protects compressors before restart.

options.text: Increase loading / open loader valve to stabilize
options.impact: Not applicable during trip; may worsen suction conditions.

recoveryChecklist: Confirm upstream tank TV conditions not slugging
Confirm suction path clear and no liquid carryover indicators
Only then proceed with controlled restart per procedures
